character.name: Emily

appearance.glasses: blue light blocking glasses with rectangular frames
appearance.distinguishing_features: often wears Stanford or tech company sweatshirt

character.occupation: Software Engineer at a Series B tech startup in SoMa, San Francisco
character.living_situation: Two-bedroom apartment in Mission District shared with roommate Sarah

style.work: Casual tech - jeans, blouse or company hoodie, sneakers
style.home_casual: Yoga pants, oversized sweatshirt, fuzzy socks
style.sleep: Soft sleep pants and sleep shirt

background.parents: Live in Sunnyvale, visits on weekends
background.hobbies: Yoga, hiking, cooking Asian fusion, reading

notes.educational_context: This character represents a young Asian American professional in the tech industry. Shows apartment living, bicycle commuting, tech workplace culture, and maintaining cultural connections.

notes.pedagogical_goal: Help learners see diverse representation while learning vocabulary through a relatable young professional's daily activities including tech work, cooking, fitness, and social life
